Ann_Arbor.Convocation Center (Eastern Michigan Uni: The EMU Convocation Center is a multi-purpose sports and entertainment complex located on Eastern Michigan University’s west campus. Built in 1998 as part of a campus upgrade initiative, the EMU Convocation Center is a 204,316 square-foot structure that features three user-friendly levels including arena, concourse, and office. The EMU Convocation Center also boasts versatile seating configurations to maximize space usage.
